## Description and Rationale

Motivation: to apply and test predictive modeling skills on a unique, large-scale aviation dataset. The challenge of working with noisy, real-world data to solve a critical issue like fuel efficiency is a compelling opportunity.

## Details

* Type: NA
* Country: Ethiopia

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(gt)

gt(tibble::tribble(
  ~id, ~forename, ~surname,  ~affiliation,
   1L,   "Xyzzy",  "XYZZY", "Undisclosed"
  )
) |> cols_label(id = md("**ID**"), forename = md("**Forename**"), surname ~ md("**Surname**"), affiliation ~ md("**Affiliation**"))
```
